divs: Sighting DetailsI saw the same thing the other person from Colorado reported. I thought at first it was an airplane as we have a lot of air traffic around the Denver area, but there was NO sound. I watched it move slowly over head then just vanish.
Summary: Light was silent then just vanished
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around March 26th 2008
